c++:

void in(int a[], int size) {
for(int i=0;i<size;i++)
  a[i]=i;
}

void main(){
int a[10];
 in(a,10);
}

// assume i in s0

MIPS:
j main
in: addi $sp, $sp, -4
sw $s0, 0($sp)
addi $s0, $zero, 0
L1: slt $t0, $s0, $a1
beq $t0, $zero, Exit
sll $t1, $s0, 2
add $t1, $a0, $t1
sw $s0, 0($t1)
addi $s0, $s0, 1
j L1
Exit: lw $s0, 0($sp)
addi $sp, $sp, 4
jr $ra
main:addi $a0, $zero, 2000
addi $a1, $zero, 10
jal in
